samples.question: Do you think every person who moves from home experiences homesickness?
samples.transcript: I think the two main causes of homesickness are missing family members and the unfamiliarity of the new town. I think I believe that everyone experience this even though some people who are not close as as close their family members may experience it less. Okay.

samples.question: What are some ways in which a person can reduce their homesickness?
